entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 6:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 47 %
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to freezing rain in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early in the evening then cloudy with flurries beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
